simnibs_python¶

Description¶

Python interpreter used in SimNIBS. Whenever scripting simulations for SimNIBS (see here please use this interpreter to run your Python scripts.

This interpreter is from a Miniconda instance that is downloaded and installed during the SimNIBS installation process. It already contains a few important packages such as NumPy and SciPy. see here for a complete list of packages in the interpreter.

Usage Example¶

  • Run the example_tDCS_ernie_minimal.py script

    simnibs_python example_tDCS_ernie_minimal.py
